definition: to alleviate a burden on sb
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

sentences.english: It delivers tax relief for families and businesses.
sentences.chinese: 它爲家庭和企業帶來稅收減負的福音。

sentences.english: Obama has spoken broadly about boosting affordable housing and restoring public housing subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬主張爲房主減負，並重新爲公共住房提供補助。

sentences.english: Reduce the times used by others, learn to burden.
sentences.chinese: 減少被別人利用的次數，學會減負。
